about_the_game:
This is a collection of setting materials and extra comic for the free game "DON'T FACE UP" currently available on Steam.

If you enjoyed the game and would like to support me, I would be very grateful if you would purchase this collection.

Note: This collection contains many spoilers for the main story, so please view it after you have completed the game.

Contents


- Setting materials (12 pages)
- Extra comic (11 pages)
- Secret picture (1)
- BGM (1)

This FanPack is provided as a separate ZIP file from the game itself.
Please download and view it separately.
